com.excilys.computerdb.dao

Interface ComputerDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputerDaoImpl

    public interface ComputerDao
    Interface to access DB.
    Author:
    Steven Fougeron

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        java.util.List<com.excilys.computerdb.models.Computer> findAll(Page page)
                                                        throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Get all computer from the database.
        Returns:
        listCompany, a ArrayList containing all the computer in database with every details (id, name, date, date, company)
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB

      • findById

        com.excilys.computerdb.models.Computer findById(long id)
                                         throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Get all the computer with the id in parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - to look for
        Returns:
        a list of computer (normally only 1 instance of computer if id in unique)
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB

      • findByName

        java.util.List<com.excilys.computerdb.models.Computer> findByName(java.lang.String name)
                                                           throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Get all the computer with a name starting with the parameter name, an empty array otherwise.
        Parameters:
        name - : name of the computer to find
        Returns:
        a list of Computer corresponding to the name
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB

      • insertComputer

        void insertComputer(com.excilys.computerdb.models.Computer computer)
             throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Insert a computer taken in parameter in database.
        Parameters:
        computer - to insert
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB

      • updateComputer

        void updateComputer(com.excilys.computerdb.models.Computer computer)
             throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Update a computer taken in parameter in database the computer at the id(Parameter) by the computer in Parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - to update
        computer - will replace the computer at id = id(Parameters)
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException

      • deleteComputer

        void deleteComputer(long id)
             throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Delete computer in database at ID.
        Parameters:
        id - : id to delete
        connection - connection for Transaction
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB

      • countComputer

        java.lang.Long countComputer()
                      throws CriticalDatabaseException
        Send back the number of computer in db.
        Returns:
        an int
        Throws:
        CriticalDatabaseException - thrown when somehting is wrong with the DB
